title: EPISTOLA J. Gombinski
html:
EPISTOLA J. Gombinski

I have one or two suggestions....

  1. Treppe equals 'stairs/staircase' not 'steps'

  2. The French say l'esprit d'escalier not “les paroles d'escalier.” [J. Gombinski, London].
